title: (4354) 3 Bedrooms Apartment For Sale in Thalawathugoda
details: The apartment is located on a 1st level floor with breathtaking views of the Garden and Swimming Pool. The Apartment has 3 Bedrooms & 2 Bathrooms (1 attached and 1 common). Plus this has a room for the maids and a bathroom as well. And the apartment is very spacious as it has a floor area of 1500 square feet. swimming pool, Rs. 220 (Negotiable) 22 Million
